data.message: Hi Facebook. I have an email address from my college. However even though I add it I can`t seem to join the college network. Therefore I can`t access the community. Please provide a solution. I have reported many times, but I haven`t received a single response

replies.message: Hi Madhawa. First make sure you have added your new email and set it as your default. You can follow these steps to do so, http://bit.ly/2tujpxA. After you have done that, select your school community at the following link: http://bit.ly/2sQkYDN. Hope this helps. -Ashley
